item.description:
If life is supposed to be simple, free and easy, why does it feel so complicated and overwhelming? Wouldn't it be nice to return to the carefree and loving nature of our youth? Life is simple when we forget about our problems, fears, worries, and doubts. Slowing the mind down and learning to breathe and relax is the most simple thing we can do to accomplish the most challenging of tasks. Learn to simplify your life by letting go of the complications that clutter the heart and mind.


Suggested Donation $25 â€¢ Bring a Friend for Free!
item.name: Simplify your Life with Father Peter
